description:
Natsu challenges Aria of the Heavens with plenty of vigor, but faced with Aria`s Airspace magic he can`t even make a dent, and the fight is completely one-sided. Just then, somehow Erza arrives, despite being almost mortally wounded earlier! Does a wounded Erza even have a chance to win against the one known as the strongest of the Element 4? Elsewhere, Lucy is recaptured by Gajeel! Phantom Lord gathers its strength... What will be the next stage in this epic struggle?!
Source: crunchyroll
